* Strong foundation in data structures, algorithms, networking, and design patterns.

* Working knowledge of SQL and database modelling.

* Proficiency with modern software lifecycle tools: Git, ADO,JIRA, Artifactory.
* Strong problem\\-solving skills with the ability to debug complex distributed systems.
* Excellent communication skills (verbal and written) to present technical ideas and collaborate with business stakeholders.

* Strong grasp of object\\-oriented design, design patterns, SOLID principles, and clean architecture.
* Experience working in cross\\-functional teams as a full\\-stack contributor.
